column2: Lazydays Holdings, Inc. retails recreational vehicles, motorcycles, jet skis and related accessories. The company is headquartered in New York City, New York and currently employs 850 full-time employees. The firm provides product offering of both motorized and towable RVs in six dealerships in four states: Florida, Arizona, Colorado and Minnesota. Its focused areas include financing and insurance (F&I), service and repair, parts and accessories, rentals, and hospitality offerings. The Companyâ€™s service offerings include RV Collision Repair, RV Roof Repair, RV Paint Repair, RV Interior Remodeling, RV Glass And Windshield, and RV Chassis Shop. The firm features approximately 3,000 new and pre-owned RVs, more than 400 service bays, five accessories and parts stores and two on-site campgrounds with over 700 RV campsites. The company also has rental fleets in Florida, Arizona and Colorado. The firm operates through its subsidiaries, including Lazydays R.V. Center, Inc., Lazydays R.V. and Center, Inc.
